title: 'Bottle Shock' Film Director Plots Animated Musical Remake—Funded by NFTs
description: The "Bottle Shock" revival will reimagine the original live-action Alan Rickman wine film. Its creators say NFT holders will profit if the film sells to a distributor.

title: Former SEC Lawyer John Reed Stark Calls Crypto ‘A Modern-Day Emperor Has No Clothes’
description: Earlier today, John Reed Stark, a digital regulatory compliance expert with 15 years as an SEC enforcement attorney, shared an exhaustive critique of the NFT market and the broader crypto industry on social media platform X (formerly known as Twitter). Stark likened the NFT market to “Pet Rocks on Steroids” and cautioned that the crypto […]

title: New ‘Liquid restaked token’ tests staking same ETH multiple times
description: Stader Labs has introduced a new Liquid Restaked Token (rsETH) on testnet that allows users to stake the same ETH on multiple networks simultaneously. The recently launched rsETH token builds on EigenLayer’s restaking protocol and is designed to boost staking…

title: Polkadot’s Revenue Variation Soars: Is This the Turning Point for DOT?
description: A Polkadot insider revealed that the revenue variation, which is the difference between the budgeted and actual revenue, spiked by about 25 percent in the past week. The Polkadot network was recently integrated with Circle USDC to enable mass adoption of DeFi and stablecoins. The Polkadot (DOT) team has been working throughout the crypto bear [...]
